content: Hey! My code for problem 2 of the Lecture 3 Finger Exercises is being told that it only passes 70% of the the test cases. However, it is printing the correct answer just being marked wrong. How do I fix this?
subject: Issues With Lecture 3 Finger Exercises

content:
Please make a private piazza post sharing your code or come to office hours. The grader seems to be working fine on our end.

Edit by Ana: Notice that the test cases you are failing happen when the str is 1 or 2 chars long. Your if statement for that case is printing the correct thing, which is good. But, you have a final print statement at the end of your conditionals. So for these test cases you are printing a final empty line below the correct printout.
